channel.title: [Release] Thunder Set
channel.description:
Alright, before anyone says anything, these models look somewhat crappy outside of a client :P. They're meant for RSPS, and are low poly because of that to that, but I figured some people may find it interesting, so yea. I'm releasing ;D
Video of all of the items and functions (Yea.. I was too lazy for pics): http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=219c802&s=5
Download: http://uppit.com/v/1N1W4CPW
The download includes both the ints and code to place in client.java for using the items on eachother. I hope you all enjoy :D

item.title: [Release] Thunder Set
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:9, topic:339442”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=435829.msg3203043#msg3203043 date=1273517807]
Nice, most people just usally just make the bad ass model or something then release.
On the other hand, you made the thunder shield and sword, but you also made other things to make that:)
Very nice, rep++.
[/quote]I made a shield? :3 I might make one now, actually… but I’m not sure. I kinda want to make another combining set <.<

And actually, the Thunder Stone in the set wasn’t supposed to exist. I originally made an obelisk to use the items on, but it didn’t work right with my client (probably just the ID/Ints I made, and yes they were correct), so I just made the stone to replace it.
So if I do make another set, what should it be themed around? Ice, perhaps?[/quote]

i would say something enchanted, like a spirit sword or something (yes i know theres spirit shields but w.e)

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Thunder Set
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“demonlover14, post:8, topic:339442”]Nice, most people just usally just make the bad ass model or something then release.
On the other hand, you made the thunder shield and sword, but you also made other things to make that:)
Very nice, rep++.[/quote]I made a shield? :3 I might make one now, actually… but I’m not sure. I kinda want to make another combining set <.<

And actually, the Thunder Stone in the set wasn’t supposed to exist. I originally made an obelisk to use the items on, but it didn’t work right with my client (probably just the ID/Ints I made, and yes they were correct), so I just made the stone to replace it.
So if I do make another set, what should it be themed around? Ice, perhaps?

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Thunder Set
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:5, topic:339442”]Looks, cool. I actually laughed cuz of the retardedness, but it was actually something new. 8/10, mainly because the defender and the dagger make a dagger.[/quote]I know right?!

Quite frankly I just wanted to make a set of stuff that can be used on each other for the lulz.
Oh yea, I might actually add a special to the final weapon. Considering it took 4 items, 2 of which having special attacks, I might as well If I do make it, I’ll add it to the original post.

EDIT: Oh rofl. 1,111 posts, 11 days, 11 hours. I r so kewl atm

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Thunder Set
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Looks, cool. I actually laughed cuz of the retardedness, but it was actually something new. 8/10, mainly because the defender and the dagger make a dagger.
